snippet.title: HexaMoon Guardians - Playstation Gameplay Sample
snippet.description:
Publisher: Increment P
Developer: Studio OX
Release Date: March 30, 2000
Alternative Title: ヘキサムーン・ガーディアンズ

"HexaMoon Guardians" is divided into two part simulation and part adventure.
    And continue to promote the story in the adventure part, turn-based fight riding a robot in the simulation part.
    "Recovery" action can only Dorugaiya, if it meets the necessary requirements, it is possible to "persuade" enemy (Princess). 

During radio advertising, it was announced initially as Sakura Wars, it was notice that it will be a of a "dramatic adventure", but after the release has been postponed the scenario has been a fixed branch without eventually by Character Designer Noritaka Suzuki.
